titleInfo.title: Biographical sketches of deceased North American mycologists including a few European mycologists (A-K)

mods.abstract: Brief biographical entries with references on important mycologists. Individuals described include Lawrence Marion Ames, Samuel McCutcheon Bain, Howard James Baker, Mary Elizabeth Banning and many more.

name.namePart: Buller, A. H. Reginald (Arthur Henry Reginald), 1874-1944
Krieger, L. C. C. (Louis Charles Christopher), 1873-1940

location.physicalLocation: University of Tennessee, Knoxville. Special Collections

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Created and edited in general conformance to MODS Guidelines (Version 3.5).

titleInfo.title: Biographical sketches of deceased North American mycologists including a few European mycologists (L-Z)

mods.abstract: Brief biographical entries with references on important mycologists. Individuals described include David Hunt Linder, George Martin, Arthur Jackson Mix, Elizabeth Eaton Morse, and many more.

titleInfo.title: Introduction to L.R. Hesler's Mushroom notebooks

mods.abstract: Essay on the contributions of L. R. Hesler and the significance of his mushroom notebooks. Many of Hesler's contemporaries, such as William Chambers Coker, are mentioned.
